text: Tori say Human metapneumovirus (HMPV) don show dey spread for social media.
label: pidgin

text: Di World Health Organization (WHO) and  di Africa Center for Disease Control neva issue alert on top di mata.
label: pidgin

text: However, pipo don begin worry and dey try find out informate about di disease wit fear say make e no go be like di Covid virus wey affect di world.
label: pidgin

text: Research show say HMPV na respiratory disease wey dey affect pipo of all ages, especially among young children, older adults, and pipo wey get weak immune systems.
label: pidgin

text: Human metapneumovirus fit lead to more serious complications like bronchitis or pneumonia, according to di US Centre for disease control.
label: pidgin

text: Di disease dey di same family as respiratory syncytial virus (RSV), and e don dey around since at least 2001 wen dem first identify am for di Netherlands.
label: pidgin

text: Na during winter and colder seasons e dey spread well-well and pipo dey catch am through direct contact wit pesin or surface wey dey infected wit di virus.
label: pidgin

text: HMPV neva get any vaccine but di treatment dey similar to oda viral infections and e dey require proper health monitoring to mange di symptoms.
label: pidgin

text: According to plenty news tori wey BBC neva fit confam, cases of HMPV dey rise across northern China, particularly among children.
label: pidgin

text: Dis outbreak dey come five years afta di coronavirus wey start for  Wuhan, China, wey later turn global pandemic.
label: pidgin

text: Fotos and videos of pipo wey dey wear mask for hospitals for China spread on social media platforms and local reports compare di scenes to wetin happun during di outbreak of Covid.
label: pidgin

text: Local reports say health authorities dey implement new measures to monitor and manage di spread of pneumonia cases of di disease.
label: pidgin

text: Respiratory infections dey rise during di winter season, Chinese foreign ministry spokesperson Mao Ning tok on Friday, The Guardian quote.
label: pidgin

text: Di symptoms for HMPV and oda respiratory viruses dey similar
label: pidgin

text: Di virus dey spread di most wen pesin come in close contact wit pesin wey dey infected pesin. You fit dey exposed to di virus if you:
label: pidgin

text: Once human metapneumovirus enta your body, di incubation period – di time between exposure to di first signs of symptoms – na three to six days.
label: pidgin

text: Both Human metapneumovirus and COVID-19 na contagious respiratory illnesses and dem get similar symptoms, wey be runny nose, coughing, a fever, congestion, a sore throat, and shortness of breath.
label: pidgin

text: Dem also dey spread di same ways too. For dia most serious forms, both fit lead to hospitalization.
label: pidgin

text: But antiviral therapy or vaccine no dey to treat HMPV unlike Covid 19.
label: pidgin

text: HMPV na seasonal virus, e dey appear only during winter and spring, unlike COVID-19, wey dey sometimes circulate all round di year as new variants dey appear.
label: pidgin

text: Studies don show say cases of HMPV increase in three-fold for some kontris afta the COVID-19 pandemic.
label: pidgin

text: Wen COVID-19 prevention measures bin dey in full effect, pipo bin dey less exposed to all types of respiratory illnesses. Afta dem relax these measures, respiratory illnesses like HMPV begin show face.
label: pidgin

text: Parliament for Ghana don dey dissolve today as di constitutional term of four years don end.
label: pidgin

text: Dis na di 8th Parliament of di fourth republic wey don see plenty drama and controversies.
label: pidgin

text: Per di kontri constitution, di parliament gat to dissolve on 6 January, wia go usher in di new one wey be di 9th Parliament.
label: pidgin

text: Dis go be di end of di parliament wey begin on 7 January 2021.
label: pidgin

text: For dis final sitting on Monday, 6 January, di lawmakers go wrap up any outstanding business - either passing bills, debate on some goment business or say dem go summon some goment official make im brief di house on some mata.
label: pidgin

text: Afta dem don do all di business of di day, dem go now say bye bye to di chamber and comot.
label: pidgin

text: For some MPs wey lose dia seats for di 7 December 2024 election, dis na dia final day for di house, sake of dem neva go enta di new parliament.
label: pidgin

text: Di lawmakers wia retain dia seats, na dem  togeda wit di new MPs wia dem go swear-in later for di midnight on 6 January to officially begin work as lawmakers.
label: pidgin

text: Di 8th parliament go go down in history as di most dramatic and historic parliaments for di kontri.
label: pidgin

text: For dis parliament, for di first time, both di goment party (new patriotic party - NPP) and di opposition (national democratic congress - NDC) get equal number of lawmakers; 137 each.
label: pidgin

text: Na so e also get one independent candidate wey win election to become MP, but im decide say im go do business wit di goment party - so dem become 137 + one.
label: pidgin

text: Dat way, di goment party bin get di majority of di 275 MPs wia dem take pass plenty bills and programmes, some of wey di Ghanaian pipo tok say na bad law.
label: pidgin

text: Some of dis na di electronic transaction levy (e-levy) wey dey charge pipo 1.5% on every mobile wallet transaction.
label: pidgin

text: Afta di opposition and oda pipo bin chook mouth for dis mata, di goment finally reduce am from 1.5% to 1%.
label: pidgin

text: Na for dis parliament wey dem introduce 10% tax on bet earnings; dat one too, di young pipo don tok goment say na wrong move but di goment say e dey find money develop di kontri.
label: pidgin

text: During di voting for who go be di speaker of dis 8th parliament on 6 January 2021, di lawmakers don turn di chamber into wrestling ring wia dem don dey fight each oda sake of sakala about whether dem for vote for secret or public.
label: pidgin

text: Na so soldiers don enta di chamber during di fight to stop di lawmakers.
label: pidgin

text: Many pipo bin condemn di behaviour of di lawmakers dat day as dem tok say dem neva try.
label: pidgin

text: For dis parliament di speaker Alban Bagbin and di president Nana Akufo-Addo don exchange letters ova di anti-LGBTQ bill.
label: pidgin

text: Di speaker tok say make di president sign di bill wey parliament bin pass, but di president say im no go sign am.
label: pidgin

text: Di speaker threaten di president say parliament no go approve di president im ministers wia im appoint around dat time.
label: pidgin

text: Even for November 2024, di speaker declare four seats vacant sake of dis lawmakers decide say dem go cross carpet and run for di 7 December 2024 elections as independent candidates.
label: pidgin

text: But di goment party, wey be majority for parliament carry di mata go di Supreme Court wia dem overturn di ruling of di speaker.
label: pidgin

text: Sabi pipo tok say wetin di court do na interference for di work of di legislature.
label: pidgin

text: Las las dis parliament go end wia anoda one go begin, di difference na say di 9th Parliament go have 183 MPs for di NDC wia be di goment party and only 88 MPs for di NPP wey lose di December elections - and 4 independent candidates.
label: pidgin

text: Wit dis majority of 183, di goment party fit to pass any bills and approve any goment business for Parliament sake of dem get majority numbers.
label: pidgin

text: Na by 2100hrs (10pm GMT) di process go begin to inaugurate di 9th Parliament.
label: pidgin

text: Wetin go happun be say all 276 MPs wey win di December elections wey di electoral commission don gazette dem, go enta di chamber.
label: pidgin

text: Bifor now, di office of Parliament bin invite di MPs say make dem register as new lawmakers wit dia details.
label: pidgin

text: Na so dia MPs wey register for parliament go enta di chamber to begin di process to elect a new speaker of parliament.
label: pidgin

text: Already, di president-elect John Dramani Mahama don direct im party members for parliament say make dem nominate di current speaker, Alban Bagbin for di role as di speaker of di 9th Parliament.
label: pidgin

text: According to John Mahama, Alban Bagbin don distinguish imserf for di service of parliament, afta im rise from MP for Nadowli to minority and majority leader bifor im become di speaker of parliament.
label: pidgin

text: John Mahama add say im dey bring plenti experience to di position wey go dey important to steer di affairs for parliament for dis crucial period of di kontri democracy, di president-elect bin tok for one statement.
label: pidgin

text: Im add say im dey convinced say under Alban Bagbin, parliament go strong well well and deliver di oversight responsibility on di goment.
label: pidgin

text: Wit dis, if di NDC nominate Alban Bagbin for di role of speaker, di opposition wey be di NPP side go also nominate somebody dem wan make im chop di position of speaker of parliament.
label: pidgin

text: Afta dem nominate dia people, di 276 MPs  go vote, under di supervision of di clerk of parliament.
label: pidgin

text: Whoever go win di vote go become di speaker of parliament - for dis instance, e dey clear say na di speaker of di 8th parliament, Alban Bagbin wey go win and continue as speaker sake of di goment party NDC wey nominate am, get majority numbers (183) wey go make im win di vote.
label: pidgin

text: Afta di MPs vote for di speaker, im go take oath of office and di chief justice go swear am in to take di position.
label: pidgin

text: Afta im assume di role of speaker wey im sit for im chair, im now go swear in di new 276 MPs-elect
label: pidgin

text: Once dem finish dat process den di 9th Parliament don set and ready to begin work.
label: pidgin

text: Di first job of dis 9th Parliament go be to swear in di new president John Dramani Mahama; dat ceremony go happun on di morning of 7 January 2025, according to di constitution.
label: pidgin

text: Dis year's event don dey happun for di independence square wey di kontri dey expect heads of state and oda ogbonge pipo of ten kontris, wey include president of Nigeria Bola Ahmed Tinubu and president of Kenya William Ruto.
label: pidgin

text: US president Joe Biden don delegate team wia go comot di US to attend di inauguration of di new president on Tuesday 7 January.
label: pidgin

text: Inside one official statement from di White House, President Biden select Shalanda Young, director of US office of management and budget, Virginia Palmer, di US ambassador to Ghana, Karen Bass di Mayor of Los Angeles, Frances Brown, special assistant to di present and senior director for African affairs for di White House national security council.
label: pidgin

text: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau fit announce say im wan step down, though e neva make up im mind finish, tori pipo Reuters dey report.
label: pidgin

text: Reuters say di sources wey tok to am on Sunday afta one of Canada top tori pipo Globe and Mail bin first announce say, Trudeau dey expected to announce as early as Monday say im dey resign as leader of Canada ruling Liberal Party afta nine years for office.
label: pidgin

text: If Trudeau resign, e go leave di party without permanent head for period wey polls dey show say di Liberals go badly lose to di official opposition Conservatives for di election wey must o happun by late October.
label: pidgin

text: Di sources tell Globe and Mail say dem no sabi exactly wen Trudeau go announce im plans to leave but say dem expect am to happun before one emergency meeting of Liberal legislators on Wednesday.
label: pidgin

text: Many Liberal members of parliament wey don dey worry about di different negative results for polls, don tell Trudeau for public say make im resign.
label: pidgin

text: E neva clear weda Trudeau go go immediately abi im go remain PM until Liberal select new leader, Globe and Mail report add.
label: pidgin

text: Trudeau become Liberal leader for 2013 wen di party bin dey inside big gbege wey land am for number three position for di House of Commons for di first time.
label: pidgin

text: If im resign, e fit lead to fresh calls for quick election to maintain stable goment wey go fit deal wit di President-elect Donald Trump goment for di next four years.
label: pidgin

text: Tori be say di prime minister don discuss wit Finance Minister Dominic LeBlanc wed aim go wan become interim leader and prime minister. But di newspaper say dis plan no go work if LeBlanc wan run for di leadership position.
label: pidgin

text: Trudeau, 53, bin manage silence Liberal MPs worry about bad polls and di safe seats wey dem loss for two special elections.
label: pidgin

text: But calls for am to step aside don grow since December wen im bin try to demote Finance Minister Chrystia Freeland, one of im closest cabinet allies, afta she push back against im proposals for more spending.
label: pidgin

text: Freeland resign instead, come write letter accusing Trudeau of political gimmicks instead of to focus on wetin dey best for di kontri.
label: pidgin

text: Trudeau lead Liberals to power for 2015 wit promise of sunny ways and progressive agenda wey go promote right of women plus fight climate change.
label: pidgin

text: But dis no come be di case sake of many different reasons like di Covid pandemic, high cost of living plus immigration policy led to hundreds of thousands of arrivals.
label: pidgin

text: Some airports for Manchester, Liverpool John Lennon and Birmingham don close dia runways - wia aeroplane land and take off- sake of heavy snow overnight.
label: pidgin

text: Dem dey work to stop dis disruption as quickly as possible
label: pidgin

text: Temperatures bin fall to -11C overnight for Loch Glascarnoch, Scotland, UK wey dey also experience power cuts afta heavy snow.
label: pidgin

text: Severe weather alert dey in place as 25cm of snow fit fall on roads for parts of northern England, na wetin National Highways tok.
label: pidgin

text: Two amber warnings for heavy snow and ice still dey in place for parts of England, Scotland and Wales, wey fit cause travel delays and power cuts for some places.
label: pidgin

text: Di weather condition no only affect airports but rail stations as well. Passengers wey dey travel wit train on Sunday fit face disruption, na wetin National Rail tok.
label: pidgin

text: Great Western Railway dey currently affected by poor weather, sake of di heavy snow wey dey kontinu to affect di road network for Wiltshire area wey mean rail replacement buses no dey able to serve Westbury Station currently.
label: pidgin

text: Dem close di station since 27 December and dem go reopen am on 23 January to allow Network Rail to carry out improvements to di track for di area.
label: pidgin

text: Poor weather dey currently affect various routes as Northern, ScotRail and TransPennine Express services fit also dey affected.
label: pidgin

text: Some operators still dey manage di impact of weather issues from early last week.
label: pidgin

text: Dem don put speed restrictions and line closures due to ice and snow as measures wey di operator fit use to make sure say trains fit kontinu to run safely.
label: pidgin

text: While planes dey designed to deal wit tins like snow and ice, fog and high winds, air traffic control dey put strict safety limits for dis type of situations.
label: pidgin

text: As a result, airports go into some kain slow motion wit di spacing between arriving and departing aircraft increased, na wetin travel expert Simon Calder tok.
label: pidgin

text: Di National Grid dey manage a number of power cuts since morning across di Midlands, South West and for Wales.
label: pidgin

text: At least 113 properties no get light for Derby, 130 for postcode close to Weston-Super-Mare, 82 for Newport and 28 for Birmingham.
label: pidgin

text: Di National Grid estimate to dey able to resolve di majority soon.
label: pidgin

text: Fot di south, snow dey across di south western counties of England, central southern England and Wales and even across Sussex, Surrey and Kent - especially over di high ground.
label: pidgin

text: Temperatures dey between 13C in Yeovilton for Somerset. Di rain for di south go kontinu on and off through di day wit winds for channel coasts and East Anglia.
label: pidgin

text: Snow still dey fall across northern England and north Wales wia high accumulations dey particularly over di higher ground of di Pennines - as much as 30-40cm.
label: pidgin

text: Di amber warning for snow and ice dey trimmed towards di south but still include di North Midlands, East Midlands, di Liverpool Bay Area and north Wales. Small risk of some freezing rain within dis area still dey, warn fit expire warning for afternoon.
label: pidgin

text: Police don detain one 15-year-old girl for Albasu village for Jahun Local Goment Area of Jigawa State, northern Nigeria on di accuse say she try to kill her husband and im friends by putting poison for dia food.
label: pidgin

text: Di poison allegedly kill one of di groom friends, wey bin dey plan naming ceremony for im new twins.
label: pidgin

text: For interview wit BBC Pidgin, di groom wey be 34 years old, wey escape death, beg di authorities to find justice for dem.
label: pidgin

text: E tok say im and di bride bin don dey date for two years bifor dem marry for Friday, December 20, 2024 for dia village Bakata for Kiyawa Local Goment Area, Jigawa State.
label: pidgin

text: Normally, di groom suppose spend di first night wit di bride, but e bin say e no wan go dat night.
label: pidgin

text: Sunday night, afta dem carry di bride come. My late friend and di oda one tok say make I go spend night wit my bride, but I tell dem say I no wan go dat night, e tok.
label: pidgin

text: Di groom explain say e bin dey tailor shop wit him friends wen di bride friends bring di food come.
label: pidgin

text: Around 10:00PM we dey tailor shop wey belong to my friend. Na so her friends waka bring food —jollof noodles wit meat. As we start to dey chop am, we notice say sometin dey strange for di food, so we stop dey chop.
label: pidgin

text: My late friend begin dey complain say im belle dey pain am. Me too, I begin dey feel pain for my belly. We find milk drink but e no work. Later, dem rush us go Kiyawa hospital, but my friend no make am.
label: pidgin

text: Di groom say e shock say dis kain tin  happun becos dem love each oda bifor dem marry.
label: pidgin

text: Na love marriage we do, but na destiny and immaturity as small girl cause dis, e tok.
label: pidgin

text: We dey sad say we lose person, but she still be my wife sake of say I don pay her dowry, di groom add.
label: pidgin

text: Di oda friend wey survive, describe dia late friend as a good man and close friend.
label: pidgin

text: E tok say di incident happun di day before im twins naming ceremony.
label: pidgin

text: E meet us for tailor shop as usual after e return from market wia e buy baby tins for di twins naming ceremony wey dem plan for di next day.
label: pidgin

text: Na so di bride friends waka come bring food say na di bride send dem. As we start to chop, we notice sometin strange inside di food and we stop. Dem rush us go hospital, but our friend no survive, e tok.
label: pidgin

text: E add say,  dem don cheat me by killing my best friend, good person. Now, I dey alone, and I no dey enjoy my tailoring work again. We need justice.
label: pidgin

text: Di late man papa, tok say im son na religious man wey dey take care of im parents.
label: pidgin

text: Na di only son I get, and na im dey provide food for us. Now dem don kill am, leave me wit im small pikin and di newborn twins.
label: pidgin

text: Abeg, make una help us find justice because I no know wetin I go do now. im papa tok.
label: pidgin

text: Di villagers confirm say di bride don dey for police headquarters for Dutse, Jigawa State, for investigation.
label: pidgin

text: Jigawa police spokesperson, Lawan Shiisu, confirm di incident to journalists say:
label: pidgin

text: One 15yrs girl of Bagata Gabas village conspire with her ex-lover, wey be 22yrs of Bagata Gabas Yamma village, for Kiyawa LGA, to poison her husband food, wey be 29yrs of Albasu village, Jahun LGA.
label: pidgin

text: Di husband and im two friends eat di food together, and as a result, dem develop stomach-aches.
label: pidgin

text: Dem rush di victims go hospital, where one of di groom friends dey confirmed dead by di medical doctor on call. Di case dey under investigation.
label: pidgin

text: Nigeria law dey complicated wen e come to di issue of child marriage.
label: pidgin

text: Di kontri get four different legal systems – English law, Common Law, Customary Law and Sharia Law.
label: pidgin

text: Di Sharia Law or Islamic Law like im name suggest na from di Islam religion.
label: pidgin

text: All of dis legal systems get dia power from di Nigeria Constitution wey be di Supreme binding force for every authority for di kontri.
label: pidgin

text: Muslims dey follow di practice of Prophet Mohammed wey marry Aishah wen she be dey six years, consummate di marriage wen she turn nine years.
label: pidgin

text: For di Nigeria Constitution though, di mata no straight. Di Federal Child Rights Act (2003), say na taboo to marry below di age of 18 years.
label: pidgin

text: While Nigeria goment na signatory of dis UN Act and dem ratify am for dia federal law, according to Nigeria law, for any international act to dey binding on im pipo, di National Assembly go ratify am, den di 36 State Assembly go domesticate am for dia state.
label: pidgin

text: Not all states for northern Nigeria don stamp di Child's Rights Act (CRA) of 2003:
label: pidgin

text: Di CRA don face challenges of enactment for northern states, sake of cultural and religious practices.
label: pidgin

text: So as di CRA ban child marriage, other laws make exceptions. Child marriage common for some northern states, where Islam na di dominant religion.
label: pidgin

text: I gatz tok say di situation dey change dramatically, Russia President Vladimir Putin declare for im end-of-year news conference for 19 December.
label: pidgin

text: Movement dey along di entire front line. Evri day.
label: pidgin

text: For eastern Ukraine, Moscow war machine dey gradually churn mile by mile through di wide open fields of di Donbas, and envelope and overwhelm villages and towns.
label: pidgin

text: Some civilians dey run comot bifor di war reach dem. Odas dey wait until di shell start around dem bifor dem pack di belongings dem fit carry and board trains and buses to safety further west.
label: pidgin

text: Russia dey gain ground more quickly dan at anytime since dem launch dia full-scale invasion for February 2022, despite Kyiv impressive record of well-publicised asymmetric attacks against dia powerful neighbour.
label: pidgin

text: As di invasion dey reach di end of im third year, at estimated cost of one million pipo, wey dey killed or wounded, Ukraine appear to dey lose.
label: pidgin

text: Meanwhile, for Washington, di unpredictable Donald Trump, not famous for im love of Ukraine or dia leader, dey about to take ova for White House.
label: pidgin

text: E dey feel like inflection point. But 2025 fit really be di year wen dis devastating European conflict go finally come to a close - and if so, wetin di endgame fit look like?
label: pidgin

text: Trump promise to end di conflict within 24 hours of taking office na boasting, but e dey come from a man wey don clearly lose patience wit di war and America costly involvement.
label: pidgin

text: Di numbers of dead young soldiers wey dey lie on di fields all ova di place dey deeply shocking, e tok for early December 2024. E dey crazy wetin dey take place.
label: pidgin

text: But di incoming US administration dey face twin challenges, according to Michael Kofman, senior fellow at di Carnegie Endowment for International Peace.
label: pidgin

text: First, dem go inherit a war on a veri negative trajectory, witout ogbonge amount of time to stabilise di situation, e tok for December. Second, dem go inherit am witout clear theory of success.
label: pidgin

text: Di president-elect offer some clues during recent interviews about how im intend to approach di war.
label: pidgin

text: E tell Time Magazine say im disagree well well wit di Biden administration decision, for November, to allow Ukraine to fire US-supplied long-range missiles at targets inside Russia.
label: pidgin

text: We just dey escalate dis war and make am worse, e tok.
label: pidgin

text: On 8 December, NBC News ask am if Ukraine gatz prepare for less aid.
label: pidgin

text: But to dose wey dey fear say America new leader fit walk away from Ukraine, e offer hints of reassurance. You no fit reach agreement if you abandon, in my opinion, e tok.
label: pidgin

text: And for now, Ukrainian officials reject all tok of pressure, or di suggestion say Trump arrival necessarily mean peace toks dey come.
label: pidgin

text: A lot of tok dey about negotiations, but na illusion, advisor to head of President Zelensky office Mykhailo Podolyak tok.
label: pidgin

text: No negotiation process fit take place becos Russia neva dey made to pay a high enough price for dis war.
label: pidgin

text: For all Kyiv misgivings about negotiating while Russian forces continue dia advance for di east, e dey clear say President Zelensky dey anxious to position imsef as di sort of man Trump fit do business wit.
label: pidgin

text: Di Ukrainian leader bin dey quick to congratulate Trump on im election victory and waste little time sending senior officials to meet di president-elect team.
label: pidgin

text: Wit di help of France President Emmanuel Macron, Zelensky also secure a meeting wit Trump wen di two men visit Paris for di reopening of Notre Dame cathedral.
label: pidgin

text: Wetin we dey see now na veri smart strategy exercise by President Zelensky, im former foreign minister Dmytro Kuleba tell di US Council on Foreign Relations earlier dis month.
label: pidgin

text: Zelensky, e say, bin dey signal constructiveness and readiness to engage wit President Trump.
label: pidgin

text: Wit little obvious sign say di Kremlin dey make similar gestures, di goment for Kyiv dey clearly try to get ahead of di game.
label: pidgin

text: Becose Trump neva fully explain how e go go about am, Ukrainians dey try to give am some ideas wey e fit present as im own, head of di Ukraine Forum at Chatham House Orysia Lutsevych tok.
label: pidgin

text: Even bifor di US election, signs bin dey say Zelensky bin dey look for ways to bolster Ukraine appeal as a future partner for a president-elect like Trump wey dey transactional and also reluctant to continue underwriting wider European security.
label: pidgin

text: Apart of im Victory Plan, wey im unveil for October, Zelensky suggest say di battle-hardened Ukrainian troops fit replace US forces for Europe afta di war wit Russia end. And e offer di prospect of joint investments to exploit Ukraine natural resources, including uranium, graphite and lithium.
label: pidgin

text: Such strategic resources, Zelensky warn, go either strengthen Russia or Ukraine and di democratic world.
label: pidgin

text: But oda elements of di Ukrainian leader Victory Plan - Nato membership and dia call for a comprehensive non-nuclear strategic deterrence package - be like say Kyiv allies dey lukewarm about am.
label: pidgin

text: Nato membership in particular still remain as one sticking point, as e don dey since bifor Russian full-scale invasion bin start.
label: pidgin

text: For Kyiv, na di only way to guarantee di survival of di kontri for future against dia major enemy wey wan sit down ontop Ukraine head by all means.
label: pidgin

text: But despite say dem bin declare last July say Ukraine bin dey on irreversible path to full Euro-Atlantic integration, including Nato membership di alliance dey divided wit di US and Germany wey no dey in favour to invite dem.
label: pidgin

text: President Zelensky don indicate say if dem extend offer of membership to di whole kontri, within di internationally-recognised borders of Ukraine, im go dey willing to accept say e go apply, initially, only territory wey dey under Kyiv control.
label: pidgin

text: Na wetin im tell Sky News for November, say fit end di hot stage of di war, and allow a diplomatic process to address di question of Ukraine final borders.
label: pidgin

text: But im tok say nobody don make dis kain offer to dem.
label: pidgin

text: If no be Nato, dem na wetin? Wit di possibility of di peace tok-tok wey Trump go lead, wey don dey near and Ukraine wey don dey lose ground for di battlefield. Di international debate dey all about to push up di shaky-shaky position of Kyiv.
label: pidgin

text: E dey critical to get strong, legal and practical guarantees, Andriy Yermak, head of President Zelensky office tell Ukraine Public broadcaster on 12 December.
label: pidgin

text: Im tok say Ukraine recent past don leave bitter legacy. Unfortunately, from our experience, all di guarantees wey we bin get bifor no result in any security.
label: pidgin

text: Witout any concrete mechanism wey dey like di sort of collective defence concept  wey dey inside Article 5 of Nato founding treaty, observers dey fear say notin go dey again to stop Russia from attacking Ukraine again.
label: pidgin

text: Zelensky understand say im no fit get naked ceasefire just like dat, Orysia Lutsevych tok.
label: pidgin

text: E get to be a ceasefire plus. E go be suicide for Zelensky just to accept a ceasefire and make im no get any answer of how dem go protect Ukraine.
label: pidgin

text: For European policy forums, experts don dey look for ways wey Europe fit help to carry dis responsibility.
label: pidgin

text: Ideas don include di deployment of peacekeepers for Ukraine (one proposal wey  first come out last February by Macron), or dem fit involve di British-led Joint Expeditionary Force, wey dey pull forces togeda from eight Nordic and Baltic kontris, plus di Netherlands.
label: pidgin

text: But Kofman no too dey sure. Security guarantees wey no get di United States as part of dem as one of di guarantors be like donut wey dey miss giant for di middle of am .
label: pidgin

text: Anoda alternative dey? No alternatives today, Na wetin Mr Podolyak tok.
label: pidgin

text: Pieces of paper, like di 1994 Budapest Memorandum (about Ukraine post-Soviet borders) or 2014-15 Minsk agreements (wey bin try to end di Donbas War) dey worthless, im argue, witout di added threat of military deterrence.
label: pidgin

text: Russia gatz understand say as soon as dem start aggression, dem go receive a significant number of strikes in response, im tok.
label: pidgin

text: As agreement on Ukraine long term future neva dey, dia allies dey do anytin wey dem fit do to boost dia defence.
label: pidgin

text: Earlier for December, Nato secretary general, Mark Rutte, tok say dem bin look evritin, including di supply of additional air defence systems, as part of how to protect di energy infrastructure wey don already spoil for di kontri from any renewed wave of coordinated Russian missile and drone attacks.
label: pidgin

text: As Ukraine dey continue to experience severe shortages of manpower, di UK Defence Secretary John Healey say di goment fit dey willing to send British troops to Ukraine to help wit training.
label: pidgin

text: For dia part, e be like say di Biden administration wey dey comot from power dey determined to deliver as much congressionally approved military assistance as dem fit to Ukraine bifor dem go comot from office, although reports suggest say dem fit no get enough time to send evritin.
label: pidgin

text: On 21 December tori bin tok say Trump fit continue to supply military aid to Ukraine, but im go demand make Nato members dramatically increase dia defence spending.
label: pidgin

text: Kyiv allies bin don also continue to push up irreversible sanctions on Moscow, wit di hope say Russia war-time economy, wey bin don prove stubbornly resilient, fit finally break.
label: pidgin

text: Deep frustration say di sanctions neva scata di Russian economy beyond repair dey, na wetin one US congressional source wey no want reveal im identity tok.
label: pidgin

text: Afta plenti rounds of sanctions (fifteen from di EU alone), goment officials don tire to predict dia successful impact.
label: pidgin

text: But recent indicators dey increasingly alarming for di Kremlin. Wit interest rates wey dey 23%, inflation wey dey run above 9%, rouble wey dey fall and growth wey dey expected to slow dramatically for 2025, di strains on Russia economy neva even dey serious well-well.
label: pidgin

text: Putin dey put on a brave face. Di sanctions dey get effect, na wetin im tok for during im end-of-year news conference, but dem no dey of key importance.
label: pidgin

text: Along wit Russia staggering losses for di battlefield – western officials estimate say Moscow dey lose an average of 1,500 men, wey dem don kill and wound, evri day – di cost of dis war fit still drive Putin to negotiate.
label: pidgin

text: But how much more territory wey Ukraine don lose - and how many more pipo wey go don die - by di time dem go reach dat point?
label: pidgin

text: Police for Osun State don detain one couple afta di husband allegedly stab one clergy man to death on Wednesday 1 January.

text: Di 52-year-old clergyman, Bishop Shina Olaribigbe na di leader of Rapture Empowerment International Inc., Osogbo.

text: Tori be say di couple don dey get misunderstanding and dis make Olaribigbe chook mouth.

text: Bishop Olaribigbe bin don dey involved to ensure say peace reign between di couple bifor.

text: Tori be say for di early hours of Thursday, di suspect allegedly stab di clergyman to death wen e meet am for im wife house.

text: Dem tell us say di pastor bin dey di wife place today (Thursday) wen di husband get dia. Dem also tell us say di husband stab di pastor. Dem also tell us say di deceased bin dey on di wife bed wen di incident happun.

text: Police officers from di Dugbe Division respond promptly to di scene, arrest di suspect, and recova di exhibit.

text: Opalola say di corpse don dey deposited for di Uniosun Teaching Hospital Mortuary for autopsy.

text: Di police tok-tok pesin say dem dey work to ensure say justice dey served on di mata.

text: Friends and acquaintances enta social media to mourn di passing of di clergyman on Thursday.

text: Families of Bishop Shina Olaribigbe wey dem stab for Osun state don come out to tok how di mata happun.
label: pidgin

text: According to di first son of di late Bishop, Damilare Olaribigbe, im papa dey always settle fight for members anytime dem call am and na wetin e go do dat day be dat bifor dem stab am.

text: Di son say e still see im papa on di 30th December 2024, and na di same woman wey her husband stab di bishop be di interpreter dat day for church.

text: I bin receive a call, but I no fit pick am becos na night around 1:00am bifor my sister call me make I dey come next morning. I tink say dem arrest am, until dem tell me say dem stab am. I no fit see am, until dem tell me say e don die.

text: Na di same pesin wey her husband kill my papa na im dey interpret for church dat day. Di husband no dey come church.

text: One pastor wey also dey close to di late bishop say na wit knife and bottle dem bin stab di late bishop.
label: pidgin

text: Pastor Gbenga say di wife tell am say na di husband go report for di police station by imsef say e don kill pesin.

text: Di United States Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) name di attacker for di New Orleans attack wey happun on New Year Day as 42-year-old Shamsud-Din Jabbar, wey be retired army man and US citizen from Texas.
label: pidgin

label: pidgin

text: CCTV footage show one white, Ford F-150 Lightning vehicle wey bin drive onto di pavement to go around one police car bifor e hit pipo wey bin dey pass.
label: pidgin

text: Police describe di act as veri intentional, and add say di attacker bin get determination to kill and damage.
label: pidgin

text: Dis man bin dey try to run over many pipo wey im fit run into, New Orleans Police Chief Anne Kirkpatrick tok.

text: Jabbar bin get gun and also shoot at law enforcement personnel and injure two officers. Na police gunfire kill am.

text: Families and relatives of di victims dey gradually release dia names before authorities complete autopsy.

text: Martin Tiger Bech na former football player for Princeton University.
label: pidgin

label: pidgin

text: Im be 'Tiger' in every way - strong competitor wit endless energy, a beloved teammate and caring friend.
label: pidgin

text: Martin Bech brother, Jack Bech, post tribute for X beside news article wey report im death.
label: pidgin

text: Love you always broda! im write. You bin inspire me everyday now you go need to dey wit me every time. I got dis family T, no worry. Dis na for us.
label: pidgin

text: Bech be member of di 2016 and 2018 Ivy League Championship teams.
label: pidgin

text: Na her mama, Melissa Dedeaux, confam her death for social media.
label: pidgin

text: I lost my baby just pray for me and my family pleaseeeeee!!! God I need you now!!, di mama beg, togeda wit her pikin foto wia she wear one red graduation cap and gown from dis year.

text: Madam Dedeaux - wey also be nurse - tell local tori pipo Nola say her pikin bin dey ready to start her nurse training later dis month.
label: pidgin

text: She add say Nikyra bin sneak out of di house wit one of her cousin and her friend, di two survive.
label: pidgin

text: Nikyra school friend, Dante Reed, tell New York Times say im bin receive call from her cousin, say dem run wen dem bin hear gunshots, and say she - Nikyra - dey miss.

text: Her grandmama, Jennifer Smith, tell di paper say she be tin of joy for di small time we bin get her.
label: pidgin

text: I dey very proud of all of my grandchildren, and dat one especially.

label: pidgin

text: Im bin dey wit anoda cousin wey injure for di attack.
label: pidgin

label: pidgin

text: Her papa, Belal Badawi, confam Kareem death, as im express great sadness and grief.
label: pidgin

text: Oga Badawi say: We ask Allah Almighty to shower im mercy on am, and give us patience and strength to overcome dis.
label: pidgin

text: We belong to Allah, and to im we shall return, im add di expression wey Muslims dey commonly recite wen dem hear say anoda Muslim die.

text: Hubert Gauthreaux former high school, Archbishop Shaw, na im confam di 21-year-old death for social media.
label: pidgin

text: Eternal rest grant unto him, O Lord, and let perpetual light shine upon him. May di souls of all di faithful departed, through di mercy of God, rest in peace.

text: Kimberly Usher Fall, Madam Perez friend and boss for deli store wey she dey manage, call her dedicated, smart and good-hearted pesin, according to CBS.
label: pidgin

text: She bin dey beautiful and full of life, she write for one online fundraiser wey she bin set up for her friend.
label: pidgin

text: Di 27-year-old bin also be mama of one four-year-old boy.

text: Madam Usher Fall say Madam Perez bin dey carry her pikin come work on di days wey im no go school.

text: She bin dey teach am mathematics and alphabets inside deli storage room in between work, Madam Usher Fall tell Di Washington Post newspaper.

text: She bin really be good pikin, man, she really be, she tok, come add say she bin just dey get everything going, and she don go, just go.

text: Di University of Georgia president say one of dia students bin dey critically injured, while di Israeli goment say two of dia kontri men dey among di pipo wey injure.

text: Forty-two-year-old Shamsud-Din Jabbar na Army veteran and US citizen from Texas.

text: Dem go swear in President - Elect, John Mahama on Tuesday.

text: In di early 18th century, dozens of pipo for Serbia start to die mysteriously, allegedly becos dem dey haunted by dia dead neighbours and dey experience a choking sensation or dey breathe heavily just before dem die.
label: pidgin

text: Two small villages in particular, Medvedja for di south of Serbia and Kisiljevo in di northeast, bin dey for di heart of dis rumoured deaths. Di villages dey 200 kilometres apart but bin report a similar pattern of curious incidents within a decade.
label: pidgin

text: Austrian doctors bin go dia to investigate wetin dey cause dis deaths and dem compile detailed reports on evritin dem discover. Di findings quickly make dia way to di Austrian press and later on to academic circles.
label: pidgin

text: German historian Thomas M. Bohn, author of ‘Vampires: The Origin of the European Myth’, say dat na how di word ‘vampire’ first appear, for one Austrian daily called ‘Wienerisches Diarium’ in 1725.
label: pidgin

text: A vampire na mythical creature wey dey believed to survive by feeding on di blood of di living.
label: pidgin

text: Tori of vampire appearances dey recorded in cultures around di world, but di term ‘vampire’ dey popularised in Western Europe after such reports for 18th century.
label: pidgin

text: For Kisiljevo, in 1725, nine pipo die within two days. All of dem allegedly tok about a certain neighbour before dia deaths.
label: pidgin

text: Dem say a man called Petar Blagojevic - wey bin don already die earlier - bin come to visit dem for dia dreams and start to choke dem.
label: pidgin

text: In response, di locals open up Blagojevic grave and find a well-preserved body wey dey perceived as an ‘evidence of di devil’s business’.
label: pidgin

text: “Face, hands, and feet, in fact di whole body, no fit dey better preserved if e bin dey alive,” na so one Austrian official write wey bin dey present for di exhumation.
label: pidgin

text: “In di mouth, to my big surprise, I find fresh blood, wey im, according to di general belief, suck out of those e kill.”
label: pidgin

text: Professor Clemens Ruthner from di Trinity College in Dublin believe say di word ‘vampire’ originate from dis time wen di Austrian doctors bin dey open up graves and tok to di local interpreters to understand wetin bin don take place.
label: pidgin

text: “Di interpreter probably mumble sometin like 'upir', wey be Slovene word for a demon, and in dat misunderstanding, di word 'vampire' dey born,” e tok.
label: pidgin

text: Through di colonial encounter between Austrian officials wey think of demsefs as ‘enlightened’ and local villagers wey dey perceived as ‘primitive’ by Austrians, a new creature come into existence, e add.
label: pidgin

text: In order to stop Petar, villagers allegedly drive a stake through im heart and den burn im body, putting an end to di reports of vampires for di village.
label: pidgin

text: Although dis incidents catch attention, di moment bin no dey ripe yet for ‘vampirism’ – a term wey dem dey use to refer to a belief in vampires - to catch di imagination of a broader public, according to Professor Bohn.
label: pidgin

text: Di spirit of enlightenment for dat period bin no accept anytin wey no fit dey explained rationally.
label: pidgin

text: Seven years later, for January 1732, fear hold di village of Medvedja.
label: pidgin

text: Within three months 17 pipo, some of dem dey young and healthy, die out of no clear reason.
label: pidgin

text: Similar to di incidents for Kisiljevo, some of di deceased complain about a strong sensation of suffocation and fierce chest pains before death.
label: pidgin

text: After following di order to exhume di graves, Doctor Johannes Fluckinger write a report wia e mention a militiaman as di chief perpetrator in di cases of ‘vampirism’.
label: pidgin

text: Im body reportedly still dey undecomposed, and fresh blood bin flow from im eyes, nose, mouth, and ears.
label: pidgin

text: Dis dey seen as a proof by di pipo of Medvedja say im indeed na vampire, wey be why dem drive a stake through im heart and den burn im body, too.
label: pidgin

text: “Little dey known about di life and fate of dis man, wey die after e fall and di villagers den turn am into a scapegoat,” na so Thomas Bohn write for im book.
label: pidgin

text: E believe say dis man na Arnaut Pavle, one Albanian wey arrive from Kosovo.
label: pidgin

text: “Petar Blagojevic for Kisiljevo and Arnaut Pavle for Medvedja na di first known representatives of di vampire species,” e tok.
label: pidgin

text: While di villagers bin dey afraid of di bodies wey no decompose, contemporary pathologists point out say di state wey dem see di  eceased no dey uncommon.
label: pidgin

text: “Christian Reiter, prominent Viennese pathologist, think say behind all dis cases na di anthrax epidemic - a usual occurrence in periods during and after wars in di past,” Professor Ruthner tok.
label: pidgin

text: Anthrax na bacterial disease wey dey cross from infected animals to pipo and often result in death.
label: pidgin

text: Ruthner also believe say reports of suffocation prior to death fit dey related to pneumonia.
label: pidgin

text: “If you read di reports carefully, you go see say no one see di vampires with dia own eyes. Di idea say dem suck blood na di interpretation of Austrian doctors,” e tok.
label: pidgin

text: Thomas Bohn also think say di bloodsucking na myth wey dey created by di western public.
label: pidgin

text: Still di belief in and fear from vampires carry on in di psyche, according to one local historian from Medvedja, Ivan Nesic.
label: pidgin

text: E point out say even long after Petar Blagojevic and Arnaut Pavle die, locals try to protect dia personal space from vampires.
label: pidgin

text: “Serbian vampire [dey believed to resemble] an inflated bubble of skin, filled with blood,” e tok.
label: pidgin

text: “[Dem believe say] e fit deflate like a balloon if punctured anywia. So pipo bin dey put hawthorns on gates, windows or doors for protection.”
label: pidgin

text: Both Kisiljevo and Medvedja dey located for border areas wey come under di authority of Habsburg Monarchy in di 1700s, after centuries of Ottoman rule.
label: pidgin

text: Professor Ruthner believe say di alleged appearance of vampires catch attention becos dis incidents dey reported in dis territories.
label: pidgin

text: “Di great conflict between Ottoman Empire and di West na important backdrop of dis events,” e tok.
label: pidgin

text: Professor Bohn also point out say after di second unsuccessful Ottoman siege of Vienna in 1683, vampires represent an alternative to di 'Turkish threat’ to Christianity.
label: pidgin

text: In mid 18th century, a new wave of ‘vampire’ sightings come out for Habsburg Monarchy, but all fight against di imagined creatures bin dey forbidden to check superstitious beliefs.
label: pidgin

text: But di vampires bin dey resurrected soon in a different form.
label: pidgin

text: “Vampires in di romantic period na handsome, pale-skinned aristocrats, and not red-faced bloated Serbian villagers,”  Ruthner tok.
label: pidgin

text: Di charismatic and sophisticated vampire of modern fiction bin dey born in 1819 with di publication of ‘The Vampyre’ by English writer John Polidori.
label: pidgin

text: Bram Stoker1897 novel Dracula dey celebrated as di quintessential vampire novel and provide to dis day di basis of di modern vampire legend.
label: pidgin

text: One America top doctor don issue risk warnings on alcoholic beverages following new research wey link di drinks to seven types of cancer.
label: pidgin

text: Di advisory from US Surgeon General Vivek Murthy say di majority of Americans no know of dis risk wey don lead to about 100,000 cases of cancer and e don kill 20,000 pipo annually for US.
label: pidgin

text: E go require one act from Congress to change di existing warning labels, wey neva change since 1988.
label: pidgin

text: Oga Murthy don also call for reassessing di recommended limits for alcohol consumption and boosting education effort about alcoholic drinks and cancer.
label: pidgin

text: Di Surgeon General, wey be di lead tok-tok pesin on matta about public health in di federal goment, say alcohol na di third most common preventable cause of cancer afta tobacco and obesity.
label: pidgin

text: Di direct link between alcohol consumption and cancer risk dey well-established in at least seven types of cancer ...regardless of di type of alcohol (e.g., beer, wine, and spirits) wey dem drink,Oga Murthy tok for one statement.
label: pidgin

text: Dis include di increased risk of cancer of di breast (in women), throat, liver, oesophagus, mouth, larynx and colon.
label: pidgin

text: Di new report recommend make health care providers dey encourage alcohol screening and treatment referrals as effort to increase general awareness.
label: pidgin

text: Di warning labels currently dey required to say women wey get belle make dem no drink alcohol due to birth defect risks. E also state say consumption of alcoholic beverages fit affect your ability to drive car or operate machinery, and fit cause health problems.
label: pidgin

text: Ova di last two decades, kontris don increasingly introduce warning labels to inform consumers about di health risks of alcohol.
label: pidgin

text: Di World Health Organization Global Status Report on Alcohol and Health in 2018, say 47 kontris don mandate health and safety warnings on alcohol beverages, dis na increase from 31 kontris in 2014.
label: pidgin

text: Ireland na di first country in di world to mandate health warning linking any level of alcohol consumption to cancer. From 2026, e go become legal requirement for all bottles of alcohol in di Republic of Ireland to carry di label.
label: pidgin

text: Many countries don revise di recommended limits for consumption afta new studies point say no amount of alcohol dey safe to drink.
label: pidgin

text: Canada revised dia recommendation from nearly two drinks per day to two per week last year.
label: pidgin

text: Di US recommend say make e no pass more dan two drinks per day for men and one for women, while di UK suggest  say make e no pass more dan 14 units of alcohol - around six glasses of wine, or pints of beer - per week.
label: pidgin

text: Share prices of US-listed alcoholic beverage companies - including Diageo, di world biggest spirits manufacturer -  fall by up to 4% following di announcement.
label: pidgin

text: South Korea also require cancer-specific warnings on alcohol.
label: pidgin

text: In di US, only Congress fit amend di new warning labels wey Oga Murthy  recommend, and e no dey clear say di incoming Trump administration go support di change.
label: pidgin

text: Sabi pipo say seven high risk cancer wey alcohol fit cause na Mouth and throat.
label: pidgin

text: According to di Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, drinking alcohol go increase your risk of getting cancer.
label: pidgin

text: Some studies show say if you drink three or more alcoholic drinks every day say e go increase di risk of stomach and pancreatic cancers. Drinking alcohol fit also increase prostate cancer risk.
label: pidgin

text: All alcoholic drinks including red and white wine, beer, and liquor dey linked wit cancer. Wen you drink less alcohol e dey good for your health dan wen you drink more.
label: pidgin

text: Wen alcohol break down inside di body, e dey pass harmful chemical into di body. E fit also affect our body chemical signals, increasing di chance wey cancer go develop.
label: pidgin

text: According to di Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, cutting down on alcohol fit reduce your cancer risk. If you drink moderately and eat healthier e go fit help you control any body illness and live longer.
label: pidgin

text: For 2025 Superman, Avatar and Bridget Jones, along wit new feems from Bong Joon-ho, Paul Thomas Anderson and Ryan Coogler go return to di screen.
label: pidgin

text: Pixar animation studio don do cartoon about aliens: Elio. Di hero na one shy young boy wey dey obsessed wit outer space.
label: pidgin

text: Twenty-four years afta Bridget Jones Diary, Renée Zellweger return in di fourth film in di series as middle-aged Bridget, wit different life but di same qualities wey make her popular in di first place.
label: pidgin

text: Release date na on 13 February on Peacock for US and 14 February for UK cinemas
label: pidgin

text: Michael B Jordan and director Ryan Coogler don form exciting collaborations in di past. Dia fifth feem togeda na socially conscious horror story wey Coogler write. Coogler neva make weak film so far, and Sinners go continue im fame.
label: pidgin

text: F1 star Brad Pitt as 1990s car-racing champion wey come out of retirement to mentor one rookie, wey Damson Idris play. One selling point for di feem be say dem shoot am for real racing circuits, and feature many real Formula One drivers.
label: pidgin

text: Margot Robbie and Colin Farrell star for dis romantic fantasy wey Kogonada direct. Farrell play David, wey dey drive go wedding, inside one1996 car, wen im meet Sarah (Robbie). Di strangers go off togeda, and discover say dem get secretive connection.
label: pidgin

text: The Running Man na novel by Stephen King, using di pseudonym Richard Bachman, wey im publish in 1982. E dey similar to Squid Game.
label: pidgin

text: Avatar: Fire and Ash dey due to come out three years afta Avatar: Avatar: Fire and Ash go fit join dem in box-office history? Sam Worthington and Zoe Saldaña don return back as blue-skinned Na'vi on di moon of Pandora – and dis time, dem dey  against Na'vi baddies tribe, di Ash pipo, wey dey live for volcano.
label: pidgin

text: Di masterful zombie-apocalypse movie 28 Days Later (2002) quickly become classic, wit Cillian Murphy as survivor afta virus cause pipo to turn into walking dead. Di feem dey resonate wit post-pandemic world.
label: pidgin

text: Bong Joon-ho na im direct Parasite, di first international feem wey no dey in English language to win di Oscar for best picture.
label: pidgin

text: But dat one come out back in 2019, so we don dey wait a long time for di Korean director follow-up. One year ago, in fact, Mickey 17 bin dey for BBC list of films to watch in 2024, but dem push im release date back, so we get to put am on di list again.
label: pidgin

text: Almost everytin about di new feem from Paul Thomas Anderson dey in secrecy except from di fact of di existence, but dis na one good reason to look forward to am.
label: pidgin

text: Wake Up Dead Man na by Rian Johnson, and once again im name am afta pop song (by U2). E also star Josh Brolin, Thomas Haden Church, Mila Kunis, Jeremy Renner, Andrew Scott and Cailee Spaeny.
label: pidgin

text: Maggie Gyllenhaal prove say she be di director wit her vision for her first film, The Lost Daughter (2021), na adaptation of Elena Ferrante novel. She make bolder move with imaginative take on The Bride of Frankenstein, set in Chicago in di 1930s.
label: pidgin

text: Dis true crime story and romance from Derek Cianfrance (Blue Valentine) sound easy. Channing Tatum star as di real-life Jeffrey Manchester, wey dey rob for McDonald by cutting holes in di roof. Di feem focus on im escape from prison and di crimes e commit afta.
label: pidgin

text: The Final Reckoning fit be di final Mission: Impossible feem? Di action series start back in 1996, and e star, Tom Cruise.
label: pidgin

text: Wicked don make ova 500m dollars for box office, so doubt no dey about di audience for dis feem.
label: pidgin

text: Afta Conclave, one of di best of 2024, and di Oscar-winning All Quiet on di Western Front (2022), Edward Berger don become director wey im feem go dey promising list for di year.
label: pidgin

text: Di return of Ke Huy Quan na one of Hollywood most heartening comeback stories. Quan act for Everything Everywhere All at Once wia im win Oscar for im performance. Now e wan release im own feem Love Hurts.
label: pidgin

text: Guillermo del Toro bring im unique vision to di ultimate horror story inside Frankenstein.
label: pidgin

text: Marvel superhero feem neva regain dia momentum afta Avengers: Endgame come out in 2019. In 2023, di studio suffer two outright flops, but Marvel dey hope to bounce back wit three potential blockbusters for 2025.  The Fantastic Four.
label: pidgin

text: Hollywood major superhero feem studios dey relaunch dia movies for 2025. Marvel wan reboot dia previous films and star several oda DC superheroes for dia feems.
label: pidgin

text: Celine Song first film na Oscar-nominated Past Lives (2023). Materialists lead Dakota Johnson wey dem call Lucy for di feem, she be matchmaker wey dey deal wit her own romantic dilemma.
label: pidgin

text: Pharrell Williams wan produce documentary on di Atlantis Apartments for Virginia Beach, di feem na about di coming-of-age musical set in di summer of 1977.
label: pidgin

text: Di remake of Disney Snow White, a new version of di studio very first animated feature film, 1937 Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs dey make headlines already.
label: pidgin

text: E don cause controversy on social media for all sorts of reasons, including di ethnicity and di politics of im stars, and a screenplay wey dey (co-written by Greta Gerwig) wey reimagine Snow White (Rachel Zegler) as a rebel leader wey lead revolution against her wicked stepmother (Gal Gadot).
label: pidgin

text: Just trust am. Noah Baumbach, di writer and director of Marriage Story and The Squid and the Whale, know wetin e dey do, even if Netflix no dey ready to say much about wetin e be yet, dem no even give title. Na comedy wey dey written with Emily Mortimer (The Pursuit of Love) and cast people you no go bin think say belong in di same film. George Clooney star for im first film with Baumbach, along with Adam Sandler, wey be a central character in di director The Meyerowitz Stories.
label: pidgin

text: David Lowery dey exceptional wit supernatural dramas. Wetin Lowery don confam be say Mother Mary na epic melodrama about di relationship between one pop star (played by Anne Hathaway) and a fashion designer (played by Michaela Coel) wey design her dress.
label: pidgin

text: We don enta di new year 2025 and many days dey inside di year wey go be public holidays or special days for Nigeria.
label: pidgin

text: Dis special days na di days wey goment fit no declare holidays but pipo go still observe dem sake of say dem dey special.
label: pidgin

text: Dis na some of di public holidays and some oda days dem go observe for Nigeria inside 2025.
label: pidgin

text: Tuesday, January 1, be New Year Day na public holiday. Di day mark di crossover from 2024 enta 2025.
label: pidgin

text: Sunday March 30 and Monday 31 March fit be Eid Al-Fitr (dis date fit change sha sake of say na wen dem see di moon dey determine wen goment go declare public holiday for Id or not.
label: pidgin

text: Monday March 31 fit also fit be Id el Fitr. Dat day sha na public holiday.
label: pidgin

text: Easter na Christian holiday wey Christians dey use remember di crucifixion of Jesus Christ and im death on Calvary. Dis year 2025, Good Friday fall on 18 April.
label: pidgin

text: Easter Monday fall on 21 April, dis na di second day of Easter and many kontris for di world dey do public holiday on dat day.
label: pidgin

text: Thursday May 1 na  Workers' Day for Nigeria and na public holiday. Di day na make workers rest and jolly abd to celebrate diasefs.
label: pidgin

text: Tuesday May 27 na di day dem dey celebrate children for di kontri.
label: pidgin

text: Saturday June 7, Id el Kabir fit happun on dis day, but e go depend on weda or not dem see moon dat day.
label: pidgin

text: Still, Nigeria goment go declare dat day public holiday for Muslims to fit celebrate di Id.
label: pidgin

text: Sunday June 8 fit also be Id el Kabir additional public holiday.
label: pidgin

text: Thursday June 12 na Democracy Day celebration. Nigeria goment go declare public holiday on dat day.
label: pidgin

text: Id el Maulud, na Muslim celebration wey dem dey do to mark di birth of Prophet Muhammed (di date fit change)
label: pidgin

text: Wednesday December 24 na di eve of Christmas and na Christians dey celebrate am Di day no be public holiday.
label: pidgin

text: Thursday 25 December, Christians dey celebrate Christmas Day to mark di birth of Jesus Christ.
label: pidgin

text: Na Boxing Day, di day na to exchange gift wit family friends and loved ones.
label: pidgin

text: Nigerian businesswoman, Nancy Umeh bin get plan for her family, she wan born four pikin.
label: pidgin

text: In di beginning, she drop two pikin sharp sharp wit one year between dem, na so kasala burst on how she go start to dey born di remaining pikin wey lead am to surrogacy.
label: pidgin

text: Madam Umeh road for dis reproduction mata, neva easy from day one, according to her, my mama don die, so na my papa dey buy our pad wen we small, e go dey tell me say my pad plenti o, wia I no dey see my period.
label: pidgin

text: She gree say for even her two first pikin, she bin work more dan normal human being to born as she get wetin dem dey call, Polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS).
label: pidgin

text: According to di World Health Organisation (WHO), Polycystic ovary syndrome na common hormonal condition wey dey affect women of reproductive age. E dey usually start wen dem young, but symptoms fit fluctuate ova time.
label: pidgin

text: PCOS fit cause hormonal imbalances, irregular periods, excess androgen levels and cysts for di ovaries. Irregular periods, usually with lack of ovulation, fit make am hard to get belle. PCOS na leading cause of infertility.
label: pidgin

text: Di fertility nurse wey turn businesswoman, reveal say, wetin she don hear about di PCOS na say pipo wey get am, gatz born early so dem no go get any wahala wit childbirth.
label: pidgin

text: But afta her first two pregnancies wey she carry relatively young, by 26-27, na  wen her real wahala come start.
label: pidgin

text: Seven years bifor di birth of her pikin, Umeh decide say she wan born again, but afta she comot her family planning, she find am hard to take in.
label: pidgin

text: She say she do treatment afta treatment, from Intrauterine Insemination (IUI) wey be wen dem chook di man sperm during ovulation, but lack of progesterone make dem graduate to IVF so dem go fit to guide di pikin, next tin belle don land den e comot.
label: pidgin

text: Afta one particularly hard miscarriage, afta di fertility nurse use Chlomid and Viagra take follow di belle so e go stay, na im her doctor come advice am make she reason surrogacy.
label: pidgin

text: She say afta a lot of questions wey include di mata of wia dem go keep di surrogate mama and oda kain tins wey take am up to four months of research, she settle on one wey she find on Instagram wey dey share di real tori of women wey dey go through di process of surrogacy.
label: pidgin

text: Dr Olaronke Thaddeus from di surrogacy agency, explain di process. She say, we go ask you many kwesion, to check weda your mind dey sound, and make sure say you know wetin you dey do bifor we go come carry you give legal unit wey go draft contract. Surrogacy contract dey wey evribodi go sign.
label: pidgin

text: She add say to do surrogacy, you go need first comot di egg wit IVF so dat dem go get embryo wey dem go wan put inside.
label: pidgin

text: On di mata of CS to take comot di pikin, she note say since she don dey work dis work, doctors dey prefer to born any woman wey use IVF conceive wit C-section.
label: pidgin

text: Mrs Umeh say although di process for Nigeria dey cheaper dan oda parts of di world no mean say e cheap. We don plan for dis pikin for seven years nau, so we plan am, so evri money we dey make, we dey keep some aside for pikin.
label: pidgin

text: Many misunderstandings dey about surrogacy since Nancy Umeh share her tori.
label: pidgin

text: And many tins wey bin dey happun for di dark don come outside. But di woman no follow pipo argue becos she sabi wetin she do.
label: pidgin

text: She say, e get pesin wey do tiktok video wey later apologize say she tink say my husband go give anoda woman belle bring di pikin come na why she resemble my husband like dis but I come tell her no say na our genetic material we use. How I dey take explain am wey e go enta well-well na say, e be like say you send pesin go market for you.
label: pidgin

text: She tok say dem yab am taya especially for Facebook wey dem tell am say na abomination I do, I go take pesin pikin and I don do di one wey no dey bible.
label: pidgin

text: Sabi pipo from Kenya space agency dey investigate one 500kg metal ring wey crash into Earth on Monday.
label: pidgin

text: Di object bin fall enter Mukuku village, 50km (31 miles) south-east of di capital, Nairobi.
label: pidgin

text: Di Kenya Space Agency say dia initial assessment show say di big object na separation ring from a launch vehicle (rocket).
label: pidgin

text: Dem add say e dey usually designed to burn up as dem re-enta di Earth atmosphere or to fall ova unoccupied areas, such as di oceans.
label: pidgin

text: Iria womanhood ceremony na a big rite of passage for women for ijaw land for Nigeria.
label: pidgin

text: Different Ijaw tribes dey celebrate dis rite of passage in different ways but e dey showcase di pride and value wey dey placed on women in Ijawland.
label: pidgin

text: For Wakrike Kingdom wey dey made up of Okrika, Ogu/Bolo and Port Harcourt local Goment areas of Rivers state, na di responsibility of parents of young girls wey don reach 18 years to perform di Iria ceremony for dia daughters to tell di whole world say dia girl pikin don mature and she don reach di age to marry.
label: pidgin

text: Chief Adokiye Ochemiebia Chuku, chairman Ogu divisional Council of chiefs/acting traditional head of Ogu kingdom explain to BBC Pidgin say di Iria ceremony dey showcase di rich cultural heritage of di Wakrike pipo.
label: pidgin

text: We value our daughters and dem dey very precious to us. So wen dem don come of age, her parents go do iria ceremony for her so dat prospective suitors go know say yes she don reach di age to marry and dem sef go come ask for her hand in marriage after di ceremony. With dis, we dey check underage marriage as girl wey never reach at least 18 years no dey participate for di ceremony.”
label: pidgin

text: Di first requirement for a girl to do Iria ceremony for Wakrike nation na say she must be a virgin. She must be pesin wey never born pikin before.
label: pidgin

text: Iria ceremony dey in different phases and di first na for di girl, dat is di iriabo, to enta fattening room for a period of time - some dey stay for as long as three to six months.
label: pidgin

text: Inside dis fattening room, di older women go teach her evritin she suppose know as a woman - how to take care of herself, how to take care of and manage her home, how to take care of her husband wen she marry, how to take care of pikin as well as all di traditional and cultural roles wey she dey expected to perform as a woman. na so Chief Adokiye Ochemiebia Chuku tok.
label: pidgin

text: E add say, na period wen di family go take good care of di iriabo so she go look very good and attractive.
label: pidgin

text: For Idaye Juliana Tamunomie, one of di iriabo wey participate for di Iria ceremony for Ogu community, Iria na sometin wey she don dey look forward to since she be small pikin and she tell her parents to do am for her wen di time reach.
label: pidgin

text: I love di culture and e don dey hungry me since. Na pride to me say I do iria as e dey bring respect and honour. Now, even among my mates for dis community, dem go dey respect me. Dem no go see me as small pikin again becos with dis one now, evribodi go know say I don mature, I don become a woman.
label: pidgin

text: After di period for di fattening room wia dem go pet and take very good care of di iriabo, e get a day wen all di iriabos for di community go go take di ticket. Dis na di second stage of di ceremony.
label: pidgin

text: On dis day, dem go dress di iriabo in di traditional wrapper with beautiful designs on her body and present her to di chiefs and di whole community for di town square.
label: pidgin

text: She go come with her mother or a mother figure, accompanied by chiefs of di community and tell di pipo di family and compound she come from so dat dem go know her roots and background.
label: pidgin

text: Dis as Chief Chuku explain, dey showcase di young girls wey don reach to marry to prospective men/families to see, after which dem go know di family and compound she come from wey dem go approach for marriage.
label: pidgin

text: According to Chief Adokiye Ochemiebia Chuku, di iriabo wen she come out, you go know say yes, a full Wakrike woman dey come out. Dem go rub her with turmeric wey we dey call 'ikiledi’ on her skin and ‘awo’ for her hair with beautiful traditional designs wey dem draw for her bodi wey dey show our cultural heritage as well as show di wealth of her family with di iconic symbols dem go draw on her body.
label: pidgin

text: E say traditionally, di Wakrike iriabo dey come out barechested in di traditional ‘ogbo’ wrapper to come collect her ticket but with modernity, many families no like dia daughters to expose her body so dem dey allow dem to to modify dia appearance but dem must wear di traditional wrappers.
label: pidgin

text: Di ticket collecting day be like a beauty pageant and a winner dey emerge wey go collect a carved wooden statue of iriabo and di winner go dey with di effigy for one year after which she go pass am to di next winner di following year.
label: pidgin

text: Chief Adokiye Ochemiebia Chuku say notin dey fetish about di Iria ceremony but na a celebration of di cultural heritage of di ijaw pipo.
label: pidgin

text: “Dis na our culture. We no dey do anytin different. Na values wey our father pass on to us and we get to uphold am. We no need di western world to define wetin be good or bad for us. if we no value am, anoda pesin no go value am for us.”
label: pidgin

text: E also encourage oda young girls to uphold dia cultural heritage and do di iria ceremony of dia place so dat pipo for oda lands go see and appreciate dia culture di same way dem too go appreciate anoda pesin culture.
label: pidgin

text: E add say, to do di Iria ceremony no dey compulsory but na for those wey dey willing to do am.

text: Di year 2025 go be a landmark year, na year wey nobody go ever forget. E tok.

text: At least 71 pipo don die for southern Ethiopia afta one lorry fall inside a river.
label: pidgin

text: Officials say di lorry wey fall bin carry pipo wey bin dey attend wedding celebration.
label: pidgin

text: Di vehicle bin dey travel through Sidama state on Sunday, wen e fall into di river afta e miss a bridge.
label: pidgin

text: Dis na according to wetin di local official tell di Reuters news agency.
label: pidgin

text: Wosenyeleh Simion say many of di passengers na guests for one wedding party.
label: pidgin

text: Traffic police for di region report say di lorry dey overloaded.
label: pidgin

text: Dem say na di overloading dey likely to cause di incident, Mr Simion tok.
label: pidgin

text: For di pipo wey don die, 68 na men and 3 be women, di Sidama Police Commission Traffic Prevention and Control Directorate tok.
label: pidgin

text: Some blurred images wey di state health bureau dem share for Facebook show a group of pipo wey dey attempt to pull out di damaged vehicle from a body of water for di district of Bona.
label: pidgin

text: Oda images wey di bureau share bin show bodies wey dem cover some for blue tarpaulin, lying on di ground.
label: pidgin

text: Thousands of pipo dey die evri year for road accidents in Ethiopia, wit ova-speeding and pipo wey no dey obey traffic dey always blame di traffic laws.
label: pidgin

text: Meanwhile, for July 2024, plenty pipo die for Ethiopia wen rescue teams bin comot di body of at least 257 pipo wey die for two landslides for southern Ethiopia, one local official tell di BBC.
label: pidgin

text: Di landslides happun afta heavy rains fall for one remote mountain area of di Gofa zone.
label: pidgin

text: Di local authority tok say di search for survivors go continue but say di death toll fit increase.
label: pidgin

text: Foto show say hundreds of pipo gather for di scene and odas dig into di dirt in search of pipo wey dey trapped under.
label: pidgin

text: For di background, one hillside don partially collapse and large patch of red earth dey exposed.

text: 2024 na year of trendy slangs. From No gree for anybody wey appear to set serious tone for di year, to funny ones and to odas wey be just pure vibes.
label: pidgin

text: Dis trendy slangs bin pop up from anywhere. Some bin come from social media, music, movies or from old television.
label: pidgin

text: Na evri year slangs dey drop as e dey  form part of everyday conversation among Nigerian pipo.
label: pidgin

text: From funny yarns on hardship to cunny ways of catching cruise on top social media. These slangs dey show di creativity of Africans, and how dem dey use dem lighten dia mood and cope wit di economic hardship for di kontri.
label: pidgin

text: Di slangs wey trend for 2024 show street credibility and smartness. Although, no be evribody like to dey adopt street slangs, but e dey sometimes influence how we take dey yarn wit oda pipo.
label: pidgin

text: Dis na some of di slangs wey trend for Nigeria, Ghana and all ova di world for 2024.
label: pidgin

text: 2024 start wit dis banger, No gree for anybody, wey fit mean say no allow anybody cheat, bully, intimidate or harass you. E also fit mean say no settle for less dan wetin you deserve.
label: pidgin

text: Di origin of di slang dey hard to trace, but some sources suggest say one gospel song wey di title na I No Go Gree by Sister Agatha Moses for her album Thank You fit be wetin inspire am. Di song, wey she  release for 2003, bin get one chorus wey she take repeat di phrase I no go gree ova and ova again.
label: pidgin

text: Di slang bin go viral for di early part of di year for Nigeria bicos many Nigerians fit relate wit am.
label: pidgin

text: Di phrase Very Demure start to dey trend afta one popular content creator for TikTok, Jools Lebron post one video on 5 August about how she dey approach her work and her make-up.
label: pidgin

text: Di video bin start for inside her motor as she tok say, You see how I dey do my make up for work? Very demure, very mindful.
label: pidgin

text: Di video bin gada ova 30 million views and she now get ova 1.5 million followers for TikTok.
label: pidgin

text: Since dat time, di slang don blow up worldwide wit ova 200,000 posts wia dem don use di hashtag and oda videos wey dey tok about how to act very demure for situations.
label: pidgin

text: Meanwhile, 'demure' na word wey dey describe woman wey dey quiet, reserved and modest.
label: pidgin

text: Dis na one slang wey go viral and even turn challenge on social media.
label: pidgin

text: Some pipo claim say di slang start for TikTok. How e dey work na like say two or more pipo go spill out secret dem know about di oda pesin. Dem only dey allowed to listen, dem no fit judge.
label: pidgin

text: Di video of di trend go show pipo wey go tok say We listen and we don't judge di same time, bifor dem begin dey spill secrets wey dem bin hide from each oda.
label: pidgin

text: Couples, relationship pipo, best friends, co-workers and even family members don jump on dis trend.
label: pidgin

text: Di word Steeze, na slang term wey be mixture of style and ease, e mean to look effortlessly cool, charisma and to describe pesin wey carry grace.
label: pidgin

text: E originate from snowboarding and skateboarding, wia athletes dey perform tricks wit natural flair.
label: pidgin

text: Now, dem dey use am for fashion, music, and everyday tok, as e describe pesin wit relaxed and confident style.
label: pidgin

text: E really gain popularity for Nigeria during di 2024 Ojuode Oba festival for Ijebu-Ode  southwest Nigeria, wen camera capture one man Farooq Oreagba wey steal di show wit im full traditional regalia as e ride majestically on top horse. Di foto bin go viral and e earn oga Farooq di title King of Steeze.
label: pidgin

text: Di slang get religious connotation wey show sense of self-importance or to claim special status, e dey imply say pesin dey special or favoured.
label: pidgin

text: E become popular afta video clips of some controversial testimonies from di Lord Chosen Church.
label: pidgin

text: Dem dey use dis slang to show wen pesin do something very well.
label: pidgin

text: For instance, if pesin dress well or if e set well, dem go say e ate di look wit di cloth, wig or makeup e use.
label: pidgin

text: No be about looks only, if e tok well, sing well, act for movie well or work well, dem go use di slangs describe am.
label: pidgin

text: 'Ozeba' mean trouble maker and na popular Nigerian musician Rema 'Divine Ikubor' make di word popular wit im song 'Ozeba' for im latest album.
label: pidgin

text: Benin pipo for Edo state dey use di slang for pesin wey wan go cause kasala.
label: pidgin

text: Oda slangs wey trend for Nigeria include 'Go hard or go home, No Panic, Go warm eba, among odas.
label: pidgin

text: Apicki - Dem dey use dis slang if something dey successful. Di term become popular from king Paluta song Apicki.
label: pidgin

text: Jejereje - Mean cup of tea. E start dis year from Stonebwoy song wey di title na Jejereje.
label: pidgin

text: Sankofa - Di slang mean to go back to something you don comot hand from.
label: pidgin

text: Dat's on Purr - Na Gen Z dey use dis slang pass. E mean dat's on period. Dem dey use dis term to lay emphasis on something and dem no go change dia.
