text: Hollywood stars Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt don reach divorce settlement after eight years, her lawyer don tell di media.
label: pidgin

text: No immediate comment from Pitt attorney wen tori pipo approach dem for comment, Associated Press report.
label: pidgin

text: Di couple - wey pipo sabi as Brangelina by fans - marry for 2014 and dem get six children.
label: pidgin

text: Jolie file for divorce for 2016, she cite irreconcilable differences, days after one private jet flight wia she claim say Pitt bin dey abusive to her and dia children. After one FBI probe to chook eye for di incident, dem no charge Pitt and e don deny di claims.
label: pidgin

text: Di two bin dey di middle of one bitter child custody battle months following di announcement, but di couple reach agreement and judge award joint custody of di children to both parents for 2021.
label: pidgin

text: While Pitt and Jolie sign off on di divorce settlement paperwork on Monday according to reports, di couple still dey in a legal battle over one chateau - house- and vineyard for di south of France.
label: pidgin

text: For 2022, Pitt sue Jolie for selling her stake for di French vineyard and chateau dem buy togeda for 2008.
label: pidgin

text: According to legal documents wey PA news agency bin get at di time, e bin dey alleged say Jolie sell her share of Chateau Miraval to one Luxembourg-based spirits manufacturer wey dey controlled by Russian oligarch Yuri Shefler, without Pitt knowledge.
label: pidgin

text: Jolie and her representatives never publicly comment on di vineyard lawsuit.
label: pidgin

text: Di couple bin meet ontop di set of di 2005 film Mr and Mrs Smith and bin be one of Hollywood most high-profile couples at one time.
label: pidgin

text: Di marriage na Pitt second - e bin wed Friends star Jennifer Aniston before - and Jolie third one after actors Billy Bob Thornton and Jonny Lee Miller.
label: pidgin

text: Jolie don act inside in Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, Changeling and Girl, Interrupted. Her latest film na biopic, titled Maria, about opera singer Maria Callas.
label: pidgin

text: Pitt filmography include Fight Club, Once Upon a Time in Hollywood and Twelve Monkeys. Dem don spot am dis year for Silverstone filming im Formula One movie titled F1 wia e go play veteran driver Sonny Hayes.
label: pidgin

text: Dem don charge five pipo in connection wit di death of One Direction singer Liam Payne for Argentina, di authorities there tok.
label: pidgin

text: Di 31-year-old star die on 16 October afta e fall from di third-floor balcony of one hotel for Buenos Aires.
label: pidgin

text: Argentina Prosecutor Office tok say dem don charge di hotel manager, Gilda Martin, and di receptionist, Esteban Grassi, plus Payne friend Roger Nores wit manslaughter.
label: pidgin

text: Ezequiel Pereyra – wey also work for di hotel - and Braian Paiz, wey be waiter dey charged wit accuse of supplying drugs.
label: pidgin

text: Under Argentina legal system, di prosecutor office go gather evidence and dem go later present am to di judge, wey go decide weda to proceed to trial.
label: pidgin

text: According to one statement wey di prosecutor office release, Judge Laura Bruniard don already take di decision to proceed to di next stage on Friday.
label: pidgin

text: Di defendant lawyers fit appeal against dat decision. If dia appeals no dey successful, di trial phase go start.
label: pidgin

text: In court documents, Judge Bruniard bin list di charges against di five suspects, wey dem refer to by dia initials, as na di custom for court documents for dis stage of di proceedings.
label: pidgin

text: Hotel employee EDP dey suspected of selling cocaine to Liam Payne on 15 and 16 October.
label: pidgin

text: Waiter BNP also dey suspected say e sell cocaine to Liam Payne two times on 14 October.
label: pidgin

text: Payne friend RLN dey suspected of manslaughter say e allegedly fail to fulfil im duties of care, assistance and help towards di singer afta e abandon am to imself and e know say e no fit care for imself. E also know say Payne dey suffer from multiple addictions.
label: pidgin

text: Hotel Manager GAM dey suspected of manslaughter say e allegedly fail to stop Payne from being taken to his hotel room moments bifor im death. According to di court papers, wit Payne state, di room balcony pose a serious threat and di manager suppose don ensure say dem keep Payne in a safe place until medical help arrive.
label: pidgin

text: Chief receptionist ERG also dey suspected of manslaughter say e allegedly ask three pipo to drag Payne, wey no fit stand up, to im room, instead of make e keep am safe.
label: pidgin

text: Judge Bruniard tok say she no think say Liam Payne friend, di hotel manager and di receptionist bin plan or want di death of Payne but dia actions bin create risk to im life.
label: pidgin

text: If found guilty, di three fit face sentences of between one and five years in prison.
label: pidgin

text: Di sentence for supplying drugs dey more serious and e range between four and 15 years in jail.
label: pidgin

text: Judge Bruniard don order say make di two wey chop accuse of supplying di drugs remain for custody.
label: pidgin

text: Dem ask dem to appear for court within 24 working hours.
label: pidgin

text: For November, di prosecutor office tok say toxicology tests bin reveal traces of alcohol, cocaine and a prescription antidepressant for Payne body.
label: pidgin

text: One post-mortem examination bin determine di cause of im death as multiple trauma and internal and external haemorrhage, wey be as a result of di fall from di hotel balcony.
label: pidgin

text: According to di prosecutor office, medical reports also suggest say Payne fit don fall into a state of semi or total unconsciousness.
label: pidgin

text: Di prosecutor office say dis don rule out di possibility of a conscious or voluntary act by Payne, and dem bin conclude say di singer no know wetin e dey do and e no get understanding of im actions.
label: pidgin

text: Rogers Nores wey follow US celebrity news outlet TMZ tok afta Payne death, tok say im be very good friend of di singer and dem bin spend time togeda on di day di star die.
label: pidgin

text: E say Payne appear playful and happy wen e leave am about one hour bifor di musician fall from di balcony.
label: pidgin

text: Afta Payne death, police see substances for im hotel room and objects and furniture wey dem don damage.
label: pidgin

text: Hotel staff bin make two calls to emergency services, dem say dem get one guest wey don take too many drugs and alcohol, and dey scata di entire room.
label: pidgin

text: Payne become one of di most recognisable names in pop afta e show on The X Factor and rise to fame wit di boyband One Direction for di 2010s bifor di band go on indefinite break for January 2016.
label: pidgin

text: Dem hold di singer funeral for Amersham, Buckinghamshire, for November.
label: pidgin

text: Im former bandmates Harry Styles, Louis Tomlinson, Niall Horan and Zayn Malik dey among di mourners, alongside Payne girlfriend Kate Cassidy and im former partner Cheryl, wey dem get one son togeda.
label: pidgin

text: Actress Olivia Hussey, wey enta limelight as a teenager for her role for di ogbonge 1968 film version of Romeo and Juliet, don die at di age of  73.
label: pidgin

text: Di Argentinian-born actress, wey grow up for London, die on Friday surrounded by her loved ones, one statement wey dem post on her Instagram account confam.
label: pidgin

text: Hussey bin win di best new actress Golden Globe for her role as Juliet, but decades later she sue Paramount Pictures for sexual abuse as she be just 15-year-old wen she feem di nude scene for di movie.
label: pidgin

text: Her oda most notable screen role na wen she act as Mary, mother of Jesus, for 1977 TV miniseries Jesus of Nazareth.
label: pidgin

text: As we dey grief dis immense loss, we also celebrate Olivia enduring impact on our lives and di industry, di statement tok.
label: pidgin

text: Dem born Hussey for Buenos Aires, Argentina, for 1951, bifor dem move go London at age seven and she begin to study for di Italia Conti Academy drama school.
label: pidgin

text: She be 15 wen Romeo and Juliet director Franco Zeffirelli discover am onstage. She bin play opposite Vanessa Redgrave in di play 'Di Prime of Miss Jean Brodie'.
label: pidgin

text: Zeffirelli bin dey find pesin wey dey young enough to play di role of Juliet for wetin e intend go be di final cinematic version of di Shakespeare play.
label: pidgin

text: E cast Hussey plus 16-year-old Leonard Whiting as Romeo for di feem.
label: pidgin

text: Di feem bin dey nominated for Oscar for best picture and director. Hussey bin miss one Oscar nomination herself for one strong year wey Barbra Streisand win di main award for Funny Girl.
label: pidgin

text: But for dat year Golden Globes, Hussey win di award for best new star.
label: pidgin

text: Decades later, she and Whiting sue Paramount Pictures on top accuse say Zeffirelli – wey die for 2019 – bin encourage dem to feem nude scenes even though e bin assure dem bifor say dem no go need act nude.
label: pidgin

text: Di two of dem dey seek damages of more dan $500m (£417m), on top accuse of suffering wey dem tok say dem don experience and di revenue wey di feem bring in since di release.
label: pidgin

text: But last year one judge dismiss di case, e say di scene no dey sufficiently sexually suggestive.
label: pidgin

text: For 1977, Hussey bin reunite wit Zeffirelli for Jesus of Nazareth movie to play di role of Virgin Mary, bifor she appear for Death on di Nile one year later based on Agatha Christie novel.
label: pidgin

text: Her roles in early slasher feem Black Christmas (1974)  and TV film Psycho IV: Di Beginning bin earn her recognition as scream queen. Later, she play Norman Bates mama for di storyline.
label: pidgin

text: For her later years, she also start to work as voice actress, and she show well-well for video games.
label: pidgin

text: But she bin hold one final reunion wit her former Romeo - as she and Whiting show togeda for di 2015 British feem Social Suicide, wey dey based on Romeo and Juliet and set for di social media era.
label: pidgin

text: US actress, Blake Lively don file legal complaint against im co-star, Justin Baldoni wey she follow do di feem It Ends With Us. She accuse am of sexual harassment and campaign to destroy her reputation.
label: pidgin

text: According to di legal filing, she accuse Baldoni and im team say dem attack her public image.
label: pidgin

text: Dis dey come afta one meeting wia she carry her actor husband, Ryan Reynolds to address, repeated sexual harassment and oda disturbing behaviour wey allegedly oga Baldon and anoda producer bin run.
label: pidgin

text: Oga Baldoni lawyers tell BBC say di allegations na lie, say dem bin need to get crisis manager bicos Ms Lively say she go scata di movie if dem no meet her demands,
label: pidgin

text: As at now, plenti Hollywood stars don dey tanda gidigba behind Ms Lively for di suit wey she file on top oga Baldoni head.
label: pidgin

text: Fellow actresses, America Ferrera, Amber Tamblyn and Alexis Bledel comot wit joint statement on top Instagram, say, as Blake friends and sisters of ova 20 years, we dey stand in solidarity wit her as she dey fight back against di reported campaign wey dem wan use spoil her reputation.
label: pidgin

text: Throughout di filming of It Ends With Us, we see her ginger courage to ask for safe workplace for her and her colleagues for set and we dey shocked to read evidence of premeditated effort to spoil her voice.
label: pidgin

text: Ferrera, Tamblyn and Bledel bin work wit Ms Lively for di 2005 feem, The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants.
label: pidgin

text: Di author of di book wey dem take do di feem, Coleen Hoover also follow show support  say Ms Lively dey honest, kind, supportive and patient. Never change, never wilt.
label: pidgin

text: She also repost di statement from di Ferrara, Bledel and Tamblyn wey she call inspiring.
label: pidgin

text: No be lawsuit per se, na wetin dem dey call legal complaint and e dey one step before lawsuit.
label: pidgin

text: Di meeting wey hold on 4 January, 2024 between her and Mr Baldoni wey her husband Ryan Reynolds bin also attend even though im no dey part of di feem, bin also feature for di legal complaint.
label: pidgin

text: Dem tok say di meting bin aim to address di hostile work environment for set.
label: pidgin

text: For filing wey dem send give California Civil Rights Department dem bin list 30 tins wey Ms Lively put for ground as demands bifor dem go kontinu to dey produce di feem.
label: pidgin

text: Lively also accuse oga Baldoni and Wayfarer Studios wey cause di planning to spoil her reputation.
label: pidgin

text: For statement wey her lawyers send BBC, Ms Lively say, I hope my legal action go open curtain on dis kain do me I do you tactics wey dem dey use attack pipo wey tok outside about misconduct and help protect pipo wey fit dey targeted.
label: pidgin

text: To ansa di claim oga Baldoni lawyer Bryan Freedman sama back say na she bin cause gbas-gbos and now she dey lie put oga Baldoni, Wayfarer Studios and dia representatives.
label: pidgin

text: Oga Freedman accuse Ms Lively say she bin make plenti demands and threats wey include say she no go show up for set, or threatening say she no go promote di feem wey go las-las kill di feem during release if dem no meet her demands.
label: pidgin

text: Di feem, It Ends With Us, wey comot for August, na box office hit even though some critics say e dey romanticize domestic violence.
label: pidgin

text: Oleksandr Usyk defeat Tyson Fury to retain im unified heavyweight world titles and prove im status as a generational great wit anoda close points win in dia rematch for Saudi Arabia.

text: Fury, 36, find success for di first half of di fight. Some of di more eye-catching shots come from di Morecambe fighter, but di volume of punches and cleaner work na from Ukrainian Usyk.

text: All three judges score am 116-112 to di 37-year-old champion.

text: After 11-minute face-off on Thursday, Fury and Usyk pick up wia dem bin stop, dia eyes dey fixed on each oda as dem meet for di centre of di ring.

text: Non of dem over-commit in a cagey opening round. Fury showboat im way through di first fight but more seriousness dey for im  work here. E wobble Usyk for di closing seconds of di second.

text: Wit advantage of six inches in height, eight inches in reach and four stone in weight, Fury bin use im physicality to keep Usyk at range.

text: But just as e do for di first fight, Usyk find success targeting Fury bodi.

text: Two ogbonge left hooks land on Fury for di fourth. Keep am basic. E dey run around - slow am down, trainer SugarHill Steward tell Fury afta di fifth.

text: Out of both of dem, na Fury look desperate pass as Usyk finish di fight on top.

text: Motor Neurone Disease (MND) na one rare condition wey dey affect di brain and nerves. E dey cause weakness wey dey worsen ova time, according to NHS.
label: pidgin

text: E dey affect mostly pipo for dia 60s and 70s, but e fit also affect adults of all ages.
label: pidgin

text: Na one problem wit cells for di brain and nerves wey dem dey call motor neurones dey cause am.
label: pidgin

text: Di cells go gradually stop to dey work ova time. Di reason why e dey happun neva dey known.
label: pidgin

text: MND no get cure, but treatments dey to help reduce di impact e dey get on pesin daily life. Some pipo don live wit di condition for many years.
label: pidgin

text: MND fit shorten life expectancy and e dey unfortunately eventually lead to death.
label: pidgin

text: Symptoms of motor neurone disease dey happun gradually and e fit no dey obvious at first.
label: pidgin
